tests

Class AssemblyLineTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.AssemblyLineTest

  • public class AssemblyLineTest
extends java.lang.Object
    A test case to fully test the assembly line class.

    • Method Detail

      • testOrdersValid

        public void testOrdersValid()
        A quick test to check whether the builders defined above work. (correct specification)

      • prequel

        public void prequel()
        We start by setting up an environment with assets commonly used by the test suite in the prequel. This contains an AssemblyLine object and a list of CarOrder objects ready to launch on the assemblyline. A mechanic is provided to work on the orders. A CarManufacturingCompany is included.

      • testEstimatesEasy

        public void testEstimatesEasy()
        This test tests the correct propagation of estimated completion times. 50 - 70 - 60 - 50 - 70 - 60 - ...

      • testDayOverflow

        public void testDayOverflow()
        This test tests whether orders are correctly scheduled to the next day, when they can't be completed on the first day anymore.

      • testOvertimeOver2Hours

        public void testOvertimeOver2Hours()
        Test the correct calculation of estimated completion times in case of overtime. The overtime is set to 5 hours and the orders on the line have a phase duration of 60 minutes

      • testOvertimeOver2HoursPhase70

        public void testOvertimeOver2HoursPhase70()
        Test the correct calculation of estimated completion times in case of overtime. The overtime is set to 5 hours and the orders on the line have a phase duration of 70 minutes

      • testNegativeOvertime

        public void testNegativeOvertime()
        Test the effect of negative overtime on the system. It should reset overtime to zero if a day ends early.

      • testPrioritySchedulingEasy

        public void testPrioritySchedulingEasy()
        A basic test of the batch scheduling strategy. We test correct refactoring of the queue as required. See code for detailed flow.

      • testSingleTasks

        public void testSingleTasks()
        Test the correct estimated assemblytimes for TaskOrders. Using deadlines

      • eqiDateTime

        public static boolean eqiDateTime(org.joda.time.DateTime a,
                  org.joda.time.DateTime b)
        Tests whether the two DateTime object provided describe the same moment in time accurate to the minute.
